EditTextPreference.android:title: Response with Calendar On
EditTextPreference.android:summary: This is the message that your recipient will receive when Calendar Integration is enabled. This message supports the [end] and [name] insertables.
EditTextPreference.android:defaultValue: Sorry, I'm busy at the moment. I'll get back to you as soon as possible.

EditTextPreference.android:title: Response with Calendar Off
EditTextPreference.android:summary: This is the message that your recipient will receive when Text Secretary replies for you.
EditTextPreference.android:defaultValue: Sorry, I'm busy at the moment. I'll get back to you as soon as possible.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Calendar Integration
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Only auto responds if you are currently in an event marked as busy. You can further customize your message with the name and end time of your event with [name] and [end] respectively. View the help page for an example.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Start Service on Boot
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Automatically start Text Secretary when you power on your device.
A notification will be displayed for every auto-reply Text Secretary sends.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Sleep Timer
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Enables a minimum time between responses to a single contact to avoid spamming the recipient. View the help page for more information and an example.

ListPreference.android:title: Sleep Length
ListPreference.android:summary: Customize the minimum length of time between responses.

Preference.android:title: Unlock For Life
Preference.android:summary: This product has an 30 day trial and will become non-functioning afterwards without the unlock.
